casebody.data:
Judith BURG
v.
NORTHEAST SPECIALTY CORPORATION Supreme Court of Connecticut. Decided June 26, 2019

Clifford Thier, in support of the petition.

Dawn D. McDonald, in opposition.

The plaintiff's petition for certification to appeal from the Appellate Court, 189 Conn. App. 904, 204 A.3d 1262 (2019), is denied.
